newsArray.title: Cowboys are prioritizing CeeDee Lamb’s contract over Dak Prescott amid holdout plans
creator: Ishan Misra, FirstSportz
newsArray.description: CeeDee Lamb chose to stay tight-lipped about his contract talks with the Dallas Cowboys. Similar to quarterback Dak Prescott, 2024 is the last year of his rookie deal.

newsArray.title: 기대치가 너무 크나...프리 시즌에도 SON 향한 英 언론 평가는 냉정, "그건 넣었어야지"
newsArray.description: [OSEN=이인환 기자] 속직히 너무 냉정하다.토트넘 홋스퍼는 20일 오후 11시(한국시간) 영국 런던의 로프터스 로드 스타디움에서 퀸즈 파크 레인저스 FC(QPR)를 상대로 프리시즌 친선경기를 치러 2-0으로 승리했다.토트넘은 4-3-3 포메이션으로 나섰다. 티모 베르너브레넌 존슨과 함께 스리톱을 형성한 손흥민의 첫 슈팅은 전반 5분 나왔다. 공을 잡은

newsArray.title: Endrick finally joins Real Madrid 584 DAYS after initial £51m deal was agreed with Palmeiras - as Brazilian wonderkid at last links up with Jude Bellingham, Kylian Mbappe and Co

newsArray.title: ‘Shirtless’ Lamine Yamal spends much needed time off in Greece on vacation following successful Euros campaign
creator: Sherwin Shaju, FirstSportz
newsArray.description: Lamine Yamal is truly the man of the moment. The 17-year-old achieved instant stardom after a successful Euros with Spain in Germany. With goal contributions against Germany, France and England, the teenager has drawn attention from around the globe.

newsArray.title: Mozart, energy drinks and life through the lines: Sheffield Wednesday got mountains from Salzburg outing
newsArray.description: Like Danny Röhl, Salzburg’s most famous son started young. An eight-year-old Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart wrote his first symphony in a house a mere four kilometre wander from the Red Bull Arena.

newsArray.title: Heroi kundër Gjermanisë në Europian, Arteta do mesfushorin e Spanjës tek Arsenali
newsArray.description: Askush nuk e mendonte në fillim të Kampionatit Europian se Mikel Merino do të merrte pozitë protagonisti te Spanja. Edhe pse u fut në fushë si “anonim” kundër Gjermanisë, ai shënoi golin e kualifikimit, e ku ndikoi në aventurën e iberikase. Sikur të mos mjaftojë kjo, Arsenali i Mikel Artetës është futur në garë për
